quizDescription: Test your knowledge of romantic comedy movies with this heartwarming trivia quiz!
quizTags: Romantic Comedies, Love Stories, Relationships, Comedy

questions.question: In the movie 'Pretty Woman,' what is the profession of the character played by Julia Roberts?
questions.explanation: In 'Pretty Woman,' the character played by Julia Roberts is a prostitute.

questions.question: Which romantic comedy movie follows the story of two best friends who realize they have feelings for each other?
questions.explanation: The romantic comedy movie 'When Harry Met Sally...' follows the story of two best friends who realize they have feelings for each other.

questions.question: In the movie 'Bridget Jones's Diary,' what is the name of the main character played by Renée Zellweger?
questions.explanation: In 'Bridget Jones's Diary,' the name of the main character played by Renée Zellweger is Bridget Jones.

questions.question: Which romantic comedy movie features a young woman who writes letters to all the boys she has ever loved?
options: To All the Boys I've Loved Before
questions.answer: To All the Boys I've Loved Before
questions.explanation: The romantic comedy movie 'To All the Boys I've Loved Before' features a young woman who writes letters to all the boys she has ever loved.

questions.question: In the movie 'Crazy Rich Asians,' where does Rachel Chu travel with her boyfriend Nick Young?
questions.explanation: In 'Crazy Rich Asians,' Rachel Chu travels with her boyfriend Nick Young to Singapore.

questions.question: Which romantic comedy movie follows the story of a man who can time travel and tries to win the heart of his best friend?
options: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
questions.explanation: The romantic comedy movie 'About Time' follows the story of a man who can time travel and tries to win the heart of his best friend.

questions.question: In the movie 'Notting Hill,' what is the profession of the character played by Julia Roberts?
questions.explanation: In 'Notting Hill,' the character played by Julia Roberts is an actress.

questions.question: Which romantic comedy movie features a high school student who becomes a matchmaker for her teachers?
questions.explanation: The romantic comedy movie 'Never Been Kissed' features a high school student who becomes a matchmaker for her teachers.

questions.question: In the movie 'Hitch,' Will Smith's character is a professional dating consultant known as the ______.
questions.explanation: In 'Hitch,' Will Smith's character is a professional dating consultant known as the Date Doctor.

questions.question: Which romantic comedy movie features a journalist who goes undercover as a tutor to get closer to a single father?
questions.explanation: The romantic comedy movie 'The Nanny Diaries' features a journalist who goes undercover as a tutor to get closer to a single father.

questions.question: In the movie 'Sleepless in Seattle,' the characters Sam and Annie are brought together by a radio show host on ______.
questions.explanation: In 'Sleepless in Seattle,' the characters Sam and Annie are brought together by a radio show host on Christmas.

questions.question: Which romantic comedy movie features a woman who discovers she can hear men's thoughts?
options: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
questions.explanation: The romantic comedy movie 'What Women Want' features a woman who discovers she can hear men's thoughts.

questions.question: In the movie '13 Going on 30,' the main character magically transforms from a 13-year-old girl to a ______.
questions.explanation: In '13 Going on 30,' the main character magically transforms from a 13-year-old girl to a 30-year-old woman.

questions.question: Which romantic comedy movie features a woman who can see and talk to the ghosts of her deceased lovers?
questions.explanation: The romantic comedy movie 'Over Her Dead Body' features a woman who can see and talk to the ghosts of her deceased lovers.

questions.question: In the movie 'Serendipity,' what item do Jonathan and Sara write their contact information on and later try to find each other with?
questions.explanation: In 'Serendipity,' Jonathan and Sara write their contact information on a coin and later try to find each other with it.
